h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
img_above_text:
# Snow Fox Questline
The Snow Fox is a character you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth: Wukong. Completing her side quest will unlock a secret boss for you to take on and a unique Curio.
## Where to Find the Snow Fox
### Yaoguai Chief Boss - Non-Void

During this fight, you'll see Non-Void disappear intermittently either as a reflexive dodging move to counter your attacks, or in between his own attacks. He'll often throw punches or kicks, and quickly spin away becoming almost invisible and putting distance between the two of you. On top of this, he can become completely invisible and dash across to the other side of the room.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically during the fight with the Yaoguai Chief Boss named Non-Void. The boss is shown in a semi-invisible state, likely performing one of his dodging or attacking moves. The player character is engaged in combat with Non-Void, who is partially transparent, indicating his ability to become nearly invisible and move quickly. The health bar at the bottom of the screen shows the boss's name and health status, while the text "Yaoguai, meet your end!" suggests a critical moment in the battle. The interface displays various player abilities and status indicators.
